scripts.watch: npm run watch:js & npm run watch:css & npm run watch:assets
scripts.build:css: mkdir -p dist/css && cp node_modules/basscss/css/basscss.min.css dist/css/ && cat src/css/*.css | postcss --use postcss-cssnext -b 'last 2 versions' | cssmin > dist/css/app.min.css
scripts.build:js: mkdir -p dist/js && NODE_ENV=production browserify src/js/app.js -o dist/js/app.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build:js & npm run build:css & npm run build:assets
scripts.start: npm run watch & npm run serve
